entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or rain. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm near Lake Erie. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
